document.full_text: apple inc chief executive steve jobs returns on monday to the stage at san francisco's moscone center to take the wraps off what investors hope will be the next source of growth for the world's most valuable technology company.
document.title: apple's jobs to take the stage as icloud hype grows
lines_and_colors: apple inc chief executive steve jobs returns on monday to the stage at san francisco's moscone center to take the wraps off what investors hope will be the next source of growth for the world's most valuable technology company.
